channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israeli strikes kills 19 in southern Gaza, health officials say
item.description: Eight children were reportedly among those killed in the al-Mawasi area and Khan Younis city overnight.

item.title: California windstorm fuels Pacific Palisades wildfire, 2 others as residents flee

item.title: Europe will not allow attacks, says France, after Trump Greenland threat
item.description: The intervention comes after Trump reiterated his desire to acquire the autonomous Danish territory.

item.title: Panama Canal will stay in our hands, minister tells Trump
item.description: Panama says the canal's sovereignty is "non-negotiable" after Trump refuses to rule out military force to seize it.

item.title: Survival of the luckiest? New study hints at the potential role of luck in evolution
item.description: A new study on mice shows that luck in early life can determine success as an adult, especially when competition is high.
